name: ORCommonUI-Swift
summary: ORCommonUI-Swift - UI extensions, custom views, controllers.
description: UIViewController+ChildViewController, UIScrollView+KeyboardInsetHandler, ORKeyboardLayoutConstraint, ORDependentOnScreenScaleSeparator, UIView+HideKeyboard, UIViewController+Alert, ORGradientView/ORRadialGradientView, ORRoundRectView/ORRoundRectButton, ORTopViewController (find topmost vc), ORUserInteractionDisabler, UITableViewCell+BottomSeparator, etc.
